sub_topic: The construction of the Hilbert curve.
message_1: What is the total length of a Hilbert curve of order 3 if each segment has a length of 1 unit?
message_2:
A Hilbert curve of order n has a total length of 2^n - 1 units. In this case, for a Hilbert curve of order 3, the total length would be:

2^3 - 1 = 8 - 1 = 7 units.
